headline: Amazon Suffers Major AWS Outage. Here’s 1 Stock That Can Profit From It
summary: Amazon (NASDAQ:AMZN) Web Services (AWS) faced a significant outage yesterday centered in its US-EAST-1 region, triggered by issues with DynamoDB database services and DNS resolution failures. This disruption rippled globally, knocking out major platforms and businesses reliant on AWS infrastructure. Affected services included popular apps like Snapchat, Roblox (NASDAQ:RBLX), Fortnite, and Peloton Interactive (NYSE:PTON); financial ... Amazon Suffers Major AWS Outage. Here’s 1 Stock That Can Prof
